name: Jötunheim - Part I
description:
This is a interactive adventure  where a company of northern warriors, is sent to a mystical land in search of a cure, to save their village.

Take control of "Astrid", the chief's daughter, as she is forced to command the company and struggles to lead and survive in a land that hides secrets and dangers, far beyond imagination.

We give our thanks to Paleowolfand Herknungrfor providing the music for our game!

Note: This is still a work in progress. There are some backgrounds or sprites that are there as placeholders, or aren't the finished product that we want. We will continue developing the game during the next few months.

If you have any suggestions or encounter any problem, let us know!

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Linktree!
